official_title: To provide for the duty-free entry of rail passenger cars and parts imported for the use of certain public agencies.

summary.text: Provides for the duty-free entry of certain rail passenger cars and parts imported for the use of the Maryland Department of Transportation or the Washington Metropolitan Area Transit Authority.

titles.title: To provide for the duty-free entry of rail passenger cars and parts imported for the use of certain public agencies.
